languages.text: "Сладкая ложь слуг Расколотого Неба. Снова и снова... Ничего, конец этому уже близок".
"A sweet lie told by servants of the Riven Sky. Over and over... But not to worry: their end is nigh."
languages.original_text: "Сладкая ложь слуг Расколотого Неба. Снова и снова... Ничего, конец этому уже близок".

traits.locale_text: "A sweet lie told by servants of the Riven Sky. Over and over... But not to worry, their end is nigh."
"A sweet lie told by servants of the Riven Sky. Over and over... But not to worry, their end is nigh."

"A sweet lie told by servants of the Riven Sky. Over and over... But not to worry: their end is nigh."

languages.text: «Una dulce mentira de los siervos del Cielo Desgarrado. No dejan de repetirla... pero no hay de qué preocuparse: su fin se acerca».
languages.original_text: "A sweet lie told by servants of the Riven Sky. Over and over... But not to worry: their end is nigh."

traits.locale_text: «Una dulce mentira de los siervos del Cielo Desgarrado. No dejan de repetirla... pero no hay de qué preocuparse: su fin se acerca».

languages.text: “不过是破碎之空的仆人许下的甜蜜谎言，他们还真是没完没了……不过，不必担心，他们的末日即将到来。”
languages.original_text: "A sweet lie told by servants of the Riven Sky. Over and over... But not to worry: their end is nigh."

traits.locale_text: “不过是破碎之空的仆人许下的甜蜜谎言，他们还真是没完没了……不过，不必担心，他们的末日即将到来。”

languages.text: 「割れた空の使者による甘い嘘だ。何度も何度も…だが、心配することはない。彼らの終わりも近い」
languages.original_text: "A sweet lie told by servants of the Riven Sky. Over and over... But not to worry: their end is nigh."

traits.locale_text: 「割れた空の使者による甘い嘘だ。何度も何度も…だが、心配することはない。彼らの終わりも近い」

languages.text: « Un joli mensonge que rabâchent sans cesse les serviteurs de la Fracture Céleste... Fort heureusement, leur fin est proche. »
languages.original_text: "A sweet lie told by servants of the Riven Sky. Over and over... But not to worry: their end is nigh."

traits.locale_text: « Un joli mensonge que rabâchent sans cesse les serviteurs de la Fracture Céleste... Fort heureusement, leur fin est proche. »

languages.text: "Çatlak Gök'ün hizmetkârlarının söylediği tatlı bir yalan. Hem de defalarca... Endişelenmek gereksiz. Neticede sonları yakın."
languages.original_text: "A sweet lie told by servants of the Riven Sky. Over and over... But not to worry: their end is nigh."

traits.locale_text: "Çatlak Gök'ün hizmetkârlarının söylediği tatlı bir yalan. Hem de defalarca... Endişelenmek gereksiz. Neticede sonları yakın."

languages.text: "Eine süße Lüge der Diener des Gespaltenen Himmels. Immer und immer wieder ... Aber keine Sorge. Ihr Ende ist nah."
languages.original_text: "A sweet lie told by servants of the Riven Sky. Over and over... But not to worry: their end is nigh."

traits.locale_text: "Eine süße Lüge der Diener des Gespaltenen Himmels. Immer und immer wieder ... Aber keine Sorge. Ihr Ende ist nah."
